channel.title: CVE Feed for BlackBerry -- BlackBerry Workspaces Server; WatchDox by BlackBerry Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BlackBerry -- BlackBerry Workspaces Server; WatchDox by BlackBerry Server

item.title: CVE-2017-9370|2024-08-05T17:02:44.374Z -- blackberry -- blackberry%20workspaces%20server%3B%20watchdox%20by%20blackberry%20server
item.description: An information disclosure / elevation of privilege vulnerability in the BlackBerry Workspaces Server could potentially allow an attacker who has legitimate access to BlackBerry Workspaces to gain access to another user's workspace by making multiple login requests to the server.
